title: Betplay Group
author: Betplay Group
content: Are you up for some thrills? Do you want to get the year off to a good start?Betplay.io invites you to come and join Pragmatic Play Casino’s Drops and Wins network tournament. A prize fund worth EUR/USD 210,000 will be granted to the winners of this network event. This series consists of two weekly tournaments so you will definitely be dropping into the New Year with wins!The fun-filled tourney will take place from the 28th of December 2022 to the 11th of January, 2023.Tournament Schedule:Week 1: 28 December 2022, 7:01 p.m. CET to 4 January 2023, 6:59 p.m. CETWeek 2: 4 January 2023, 7:01 p.m. CET to 11 January 2023, 6:59 p.m. CETThe minimum bet for the two weekly tournaments is 0.50 EUR/USD. The exciting tourney is also accessible in the currencies such as TRY, TND, BRL, and THB.To join, you can play any of Pragmatic Play’s participating games like Wolf Gold, Mustang Gold, Sweet Bonanza, John Hunter and the Tomb of the Scarab Queen, Great Rhino Megaways, John Hunter and the Book of Tut, The Dog House, The Dog House Megaways and many more!You may also click this link for other details or to speak with our live chat support: https://betplay.io/en/news/pragmatic-plays-drops-and-wins-tournament.
